meanings.sent1: The train was onrushing towards the station.
meanings.sent2: The storm clouds were onrushing quickly across the sky.
meanings.sent3: The onrushing wind nearly blew off my hat!
meanings.sent4: Time felt like an onrushing river, sweeping everything along with it.
meanings.sent5: The onrushing darkness enveloped the room, making it hard to see.

meanings.definition: Moving forward with force or speed
meanings.sent1: The car was onrushing down the highway.
meanings.sent2: The athletes were onrushing towards the finish line.
meanings.sent3: The onrushing crowd pushed me towards the stage.
meanings.sent4: The onrushing waves crashed against the shore with power.
meanings.sent5: The onrushing train roared past the platform, shaking the ground.
